website_summaries.verdict: This ultra-compact scanner is ideal for anyone who travels frequently or works on-the-go.
pros: With a 600-dpi resolution and easy setup, this is a deceptively capable little scanner
Can scan 260 pages on one charge
Compatible with PCs, many smartphones, and tablets
cons: Not compatible with the latest versions of Mac OS
The battery depletes when the scanner is not in use

website_summaries.verdict: Scanner works fast and provides excellent quality for a reasonable price.
pros: Can scan a color document in less than 6 sec
Wireless connectivity to all kinds of computing and mobile formats

customer_reviews.title: A must if you travel and deal with forms and other paper.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, recommend to anyone who is mobile and deals with forms and other paper. You should know that when connecting to an iPad the "Security Key" written on device is the password for wifi connection. Not the 4 digit number "password" written on device. This confused me. The 4 digit "password" written on the device is for the ScanSnap app you download and connect too. Once pass that I am very pleased. I really like this scanner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Elrod

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to operate (even for 70+ year old people)
customer_reviews.text: This is the third scanner I am purchasing of the same brand. I've got it for our family, for my brother and for my parents. It is so easy to operate (even for 70+ year old people). You can scan everything from big documents to small business cards and receipts. My stationery Samsung "all-in-one" printer scans documents only in Jpeg and other image files, which was very inconvenient. So, I have purchased this travel size Fujitsu, as it scans and saves in many other formats. And the fact that this one is wireless, makes life even more easier, as I can take it with me on every trip. Fujitsu once again proved that they provide great products!
customer_reviews.author: Allie.R

customer_reviews.title: Needs Bigger Paper Guides
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scanner for my winter home so I could continue to scan my important documents. Works fine, though on needs to feed 1-sheet at a time, so if double-sided, need to feed it through twice. The bigger problem are the feed guides. They are very short, so when guiding the 8.5 wide paper into the scanner, unless you feed it perfectly perpendicular to the guides equally, the paper can easily go through crooked. This is especially true for any pages after the first page since the subsequent pages are automatically pulled into the scanner. That is usually when the aper goes crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Atom

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOES NOT WORK ON HIGH SIERRA
customer_reviews.text: I spent almost $200 on this scanner and I have never been able to get it to connect to my computer in order to scan papers I need to scan. I live with two IT professionals, and they could not get the drivers to install; the scanner would not even recognize when it was plugged in, the drivers did not work. DO NOT BUY THIS SCANNER IF YOU HAVE A MAC RUNNING THE LATEST OS THESE ARE CLEARLY BUILT FOR WINDOWS COMPUTERS. The help documents online are confusing and there is no customer support. I am livid that I purchased this waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Taylor Co.

customer_reviews.title: Portable, Reliable, and Quick Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know that I would like this product so much. When I read the specs, I was thinking that this would be a slow scanner. Although you have to manually feed 1 sheet at a time, the speed is very good and the response on the unit (when "waking" up the product) is very reliable. I run this unit both wirelessly and wired. The application software for the Mac and PC are equally responsive. Overall, would buy again and recommend to anyone that has a home office or wants to have the ability to scan something at home or on the road. Scan quality is great and the colors that it picks up is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Derek L.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about four months
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product. When it worked. For four months. Now it shows yellow lights instead of blue, which I assume means it's not ready or whatever, but it won't scan at all.
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: This is always in my traveling IT 'grab-bag'
customer_reviews.text: This was not available in New Zealand when I bought it via Amazon. Absolutely essential bit of kit for me. Software is regularly updated. All my receipts are scanned quickly. High quality for photos and documents. Built in card recognition and filing software, scan to email, etc... Excellent OCR capabilities - I am often sent PDF documents which must be incorporated as text into other documents. Obviously it's not a flat bed scanner - it scans sheets, not books! Quite happily will knit together a folded A3 source sheet. And will scan long till receipts! Which, for a travelling professional, is worth the cost alone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Barely used it because it was complicated to set up. Needed a converter for the USB to Mac port. I thought it would work on battery once it was set up, but it never did - it always had to be connected. Maybe it was faulty from the beginning. Now the wifi button won't light up at all so it doesn't let me even try to connect and it won't recognize my license and doesn't work at all. Give up. Going in the trash as there doesn't seem to be any support. Expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not working and too late to return
customer_reviews.text: UGH this should have been easy to set up but it was impossible. I even had a tech savvy friend attempt it but no dice. Now it's too ate to return. TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Marie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great unit! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really like how compact this unit is and how easy it is to scan individual pages. I use it for bills and receipts and photos, it works quite well. It is supposed to automatically differentiate between bills, receipts and photos, but that doesn’t always work. I wish it had buttons or that you could push the buttons multiple times in order to indicate the type of document your scanning. I particularly want my photos to be a higher resolution scan. I still like it for his convenience and the fact that it is Wi-Fi. Both of those work admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Mattox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, but new software doesn't support older models of scanners
customer_reviews.text: I have a S1300, and thought that the uninstall of this software would be supported by the newer one, Scansnap Home (SSH). It does not. SSH will support S1300i, but not S1300. A perfectly good machine I cannot use any longer bc I need to use the mobile one more frequently. iX100 is a little finicky to get used to, but it's only been one day of use. Probably user discomfort. Just wanted to post this review in case there are others, like me, have an older scanner and thought getting a WiFi enabled one would be a perfect match. Take notice, it is not.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best I've ever used; software is a bit of a mess but above average; needs some refinement. Installation looks like a old windows nightmare but it all works without intervention needed. The OCR routinely fails for me (and the app stays active forever) but not a big deal; receipts work fine. It is still better than past experiences with scanner software / drivers. Hardware quality and interaction with the software are the best I've ever experienced in something that wasn't a toy; it's just the software tools that could use some work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bussjaeger

customer_reviews.title: Scanner is great; Neat is - well, not so "neat"
customer_reviews.text: I had a ScanSnap scanner at work that was a breeze to use, and needed a portable one for home use. The scanner itself did not disappoint; it's very easy to use and works well for documents - though not so much for photos (they have lines) and especially not for heavy cardstock that some Christmas cards come on. However, I paid extra for the package with Neat, which I found absolutely useless and not so user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: MacMN1960

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As a traveling consultant I use mobile scanners a lot, and this is the best one I've used yet. It's fast and the software works great. Lots of options. I bought this particular model for the cordless WiFi capability, which works, but there's one issue that kept me from giving this review 5-stars. If you pair one device (computer) with the scanner over WiFi, you can't pair a second without going through a lengthy setup process again. I move between multiple laptop computers all the time and this was annoying. To compensate, I just use the USB cord now.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleExpat

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. I've been using this scanner for a couple of months now and I love it. No issues so far, does a great job! Six month update: Still very happy! The amount of paperwork we have eliminated at our house thanks to this device is incredible. Every once in a while the Android app would crash, but that's not a major concern at this time. Quick and easy to use, super simple. We upload most everything we scan to Google Drive. With the app that's easy and convenient. Very happy - would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: LennyMatt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Portable Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner to replace my ScanSnap S1100 that died after many years of use. This new scanner scans pages in less than 5 seconds and accepts heavier card stock. Getting all of the latest updates took awhile to download and install. There is a new feature that allows you to scan items without a PC/tablet directly to the cloud storage service of your choosing. The USB card is rather short so I use a longer cable to attach to my PC. I have not tried the wireless feature yet. This scanner is small but powerful. I strongly recommend this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: After spending more for what I hoped would be a great home scanner, I installed it only to discover it will not work with my MacOS Catalina OS 10.15.5. If I had know this before I would have purchased something else. So yes I am very upset tonight. I will not be purchasing anything for them in the future and will have to see about shipping this back after I purchased the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible support! Especially for a Mac
customer_reviews.text: Although I have generally had positive experiences with Fujitsu products, I recently purchased the Scansnap ix100 for my wife who has a MacBook Pro, Mojave Os 10.14.3. In endeavoring to get the product to work, I had to download the ScanSnap software from the web. The software didn't download or operate on the Mac. Just as frustrating was the absence of a clear means of securing support from Fujitsu. The company needs a major makeover for its support function, which has so many websites and an inoperable telephone support.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Cahn

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Set up took 8 minutes for my iMac computer, iPad and iPhone. And I am not even that techy, I just followed the directions. Great way to keep my office paperless when I am on the go! Great quality products and have no complaints. Start with setting up with the computer first with the USB and then the guide helps you set up everything else.
customer_reviews.author: RSESQ

customer_reviews.title: Good Portable Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, connect wirelessly to my MacBook Pro. Paper guides a bit small and don't always hold the paper straight so care must be taken to make sure the paper feeds properly but other than that a decent portable scanner
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Salesforce Limited
customer_reviews.text: It's a great scanner and the Bluetooth is very convenient. I'm giving 2 stars because I purchased this to scan into Salesforce and found out after it was too late that it won't work with the Salesforce edition I have which is the Group Edition. This scanner will only scan into the Enterprise Edition or the Unlimited Edition of Salesforce CRM. The description doesn't specify which editions will work and it should.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great portable scanner for sales people and business purposes
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few portable scanners / business card readers over the years and this one is by far the best so far. It is fast, and scans are very clear. The ocr program for business cards does a decent job but does not always interpret fancy fonts well. I am in sales so I use it mostly for reading business cards into my contact manager and to scan receipts for business expenses. I highly recommend it if you plan to use it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the Brother DSmobile 620 until I purchased my new MacBook Pro. After loading the program several times, it would not recognize the scanner. I hated that I had to purchase another scanner to replace it. The upside, this works way better and faster than the Brother.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G

customer_reviews.title: The best hand held scanner I found
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of other scanners before finally settling on this one. It does almost exactly what I wanted. I can scan directly to my tablet. 2 issues. It says it can scan at 600 DPI, I have it set it at that, but it only scans at 300 DPI. Other issue is that when I want to clear the pictures I have to select one by one, I can't select all to delete. It is still better than the other ones I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Ortiz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for receipts
customer_reviews.text: A great little scanner that doesn't take up much real-estate on my desk. If I was traveling it would be great for packing into my computer bag to make capture of receipts for business expenses much easier. The Neat software allows me to scan very quickly, and correct the receipts. There is no direct export to Quicken that I have found, but there is an export to Quickbooks, and to a CSV file.
customer_reviews.author: SilverCosmos

customer_reviews.title: This device is a scam.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for 2 weeks. Then the app started freezing up, the device wouldn't connect, and there is no phone number to call for support. Very disappointed. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin King

customer_reviews.title: ScanSnap iX100 review
customer_reviews.text: Best little device for handling large amounts of paperwork. See video for demonstration.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Scansnap. My first one bit the dust a couple of days ago. I love the portability and ease of use. I use it to scan in tests, homework assignments, etc for my classes.
customer_reviews.author: Marla P. Ripps

customer_reviews.title: Best mobile scanner on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best mobile scanner on the market. I use it daily for work and it works quickly and flawlessly. I've used other brands like Epson and Brother and they did not hold up after a year of constant weekly usage. The software and filing capabilities of the Fujitsu are superior to anything else out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Rovetto

customer_reviews.title: Form factor and wireless are killer features
customer_reviews.text: I love the form factor and the fact that it's wireless. Very easy to use, and is helping me cut down on paper clutter. The software is good, but not amazing. That's really the only drawback. I'd almost call it 4 stars for that, but really, this thing is pretty great. If you're drowning in paper and are a compulsive filer, do yourself a favor.
customer_reviews.author: Mashmal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It saves so much time! Hell, I scanned some docs in my car without having to go all the way back home. So far about 12 docs and not one problem. Bad: the Built in WiFi can be fussy sometimes when connecting to the Surface, but not one problem via USB. iPhone, always connects. Overall, very happy and hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ColemanBR

customer_reviews.title: So easy and small.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little scanner. It's all I need. I use it for receipts and the occasional signed contract. Does the trick and takes up no space. I got the matching hard case for it, which I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I have a flat bed scanner and the office has ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a flat bed scanner and the office has a few Fujitsu ScanSnap 500's. I can take this with me anywhere and it simply works. At the end of the day scan my receipts I may lose tomorrow and let them sync to my Synology Cloud at home by way of OneDrive. Thicker paper scans through the scanner and receipt can come out the top.
customer_reviews.author: Newbully

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a NEAT. Although I have to make my own folders, it is right on my desk, small and very convenient. Instead pf the pile of papers I used to have by my Neat, I now scan and then shred right away. For me, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: very confusing and difficult to get things into files.
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability and ease and quick scan ability. But, the program itself is very confusing and not much instruction that comes with it. I can't access the excel ability and doesn't convert automatically. The only good thing is quick scanning and that it gets into your computer.. Not happy. If you have all day to figure this program out, then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Works great if and when you can get it connected
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently at over 8 hours trying to get this thing to work. Got it to work, and then someone borrowed it and I cannot get it to reconnect. Physically it works well and image quality has been good, but the amount of frustration and time it has taken to try and make it work is 100% not worth the price point. If you want something that is simply plug and play, do not buy this scanner. I don't normally leave reviews but this thing has been a letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Heywood

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner; setting it up is a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a CD & USB cable (my mac doesn't have either). There are NO instructions for setup without CD \ USB. In the end I was able to set it up with using their iPhone app, but it was really non intuitive and took more than an hour. Now that it works, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Portable and compact
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away! The quality of the image from this little scanner is great. I use this for my rental property to have copies of everything digitally and it has made it easy to Save receipts, invoices, and essential documents just in case I have to send them via email. If you're in the market for a scanner, I would definitely say this would be the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: John Morin

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy This Package. The Neat 1 Year Service is a trap
customer_reviews.text: The neat subscription that comes with the machine is the lowest level package that no use to a business and Neat does not give your credit for upgrade. You will end up paying for the full price subscription anyway. The one year Neat is just a bait. There is nothing wrong with fijitsu scanner. Dont pay much value on the free one year subscription.
customer_reviews.author: wei Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 5 months and then wifi stopped to fuction. Support was not good. Made me go through same diagnostic steps I already did myself. Wish I could still get a refund
customer_reviews.author: DoctorLA

customer_reviews.title: Best scanners on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Fujitsu ScanSnap scanners are some of the absolute BEST on the market. The resolution is always fantastic. The ONLY criticism I have is that it charges via USB only so it make take a little while to power up after plugging it in if you allow it to completely drain. An optional external AC power source would be great. As I said, I only mention this if I HAD to say one thing even remotely negative. Again, all ScanSnap scanners are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: HannoverFiste76

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I also have a Fujitsu ScanSnap iX500 which I also Love and use at my office for receipts and large files. This smaller version is great to have at home for urgent, important papers that can't wait. I love that it's mobile and the case you can buy with it is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase. Period.
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is so much better than I would ever have expected. It makes crisp,clear, copies and scans them into the computer immediately. It has saved me so much time in the office since I was previously using just an old scan/copy/fax/print machines prior to this which never seemed to work quite right. This thing is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Clark

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE AND IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: As a consulting RN, I have countless of documents to scan and file. I am so impressed because I don't have loose papers lying around and save a tree because of this wireless scanner. I can rename my files and download directly to my Dropbox. I have a total of 5 Fujitsu scanners which have never failed on me from different offices. Now all I need is one wireless scanner! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ADO

customer_reviews.title: not a user friendly device
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review because my second wireless Fujitsu scanner is not working. The wireless connectivity is glitchy and I’ve wasted way too much time working through the setup process. The whole concept of a wireless device should include an intuitive, easy setup. I rarely review products, and I don’t know if other competitors have a better product, but I would not buy this one and try another brand. I’ve been suckered into purchasing two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing gadget! I LOVE the remote wifi scanning to DropBox, for example. I come home after shopping with a receipt for warranty, turn this thing on, and scan it. No computer needed. I scanned about 300 documents to document life and it went so fast I was impressed. This device is small, unobtrusive and really handy.
customer_reviews.author: RobC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give a 5 star but the battery life is very short after I’ve recharged it about 4 times now. Very nice to work with I wish the battery was better
customer_reviews.author: Paulin Vuktilaj

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a portable scanner to bring when I travel. I have struggled with this device since day one. It refuses to connect via wifi when I am on the road, and is even fussy about connecting when it is plugged into my laptop. Often need to reboot my entire computer while it is plugged in to establish a connection. Help manuals are close to worthless and customer support is non-existent. Save yourself the headache and purchase a different scanner.
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingMom

customer_reviews.title: Paperless dream!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs a ScanSnap. This is my second ScanSnap, my first one (S1300) has already scanned over 32000 pages and still going strong. I wanted a wireless model and this one fits the bill. It is easy to use and set up. I expect it to perform just as well as my original ScanSnap.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: scanner
customer_reviews.text: set up is horrible the instructions even after following them it still gives you problems once it's set up it seems to be okay but it just took forever trying to get it to work
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: It stop working
customer_reviews.text: Loved it till it stopped working today for no know reason today 2/4/2020. Purchased on 11/2019 But the extended warranty
customer_reviews.author: car

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs more warranty
customer_reviews.text: BUT GET THE EXTENDED WARRANTY! Mine was purchased Nov 2015 and the USB connector just died so it can't charge and can't connect to any computer. Once the battery dies, it's gone. I called tech support, opened a ticket and just got a quote for repair of a flat $99 + Parts so that's about $90 less than I paid for mine new. I've scanned 1000's of receipts so I will probably just order another new one and this time get the warranty extension to 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever.
customer_reviews.text: After realizing I had to download the app and turn on my wifi to get it to link up. Everything worked great. Love it. Fast easy and make sure to buy the hard case to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: David Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Convenient/Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner. I own and operate a business, I take it everywhere...so convenient. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Welds

customer_reviews.title: We have loved it and use it for both personal and business ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this scanner in October 2017. We have loved it and use it for both personal and business items. It has made our life much easier to organize paperwork and business transactions. Just this week it stopped working properly! The roll bar isn't pulling paper through the unit and we keep getting error messages. We have tried all the troubleshooting recommendations and still not working. HELP!!
customer_reviews.author: martin kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: The easy set-up and ease of use was excellent. The software intuitive. I was up and scanning in a few minutes. The battery power and wireless connectivity for my flexible office.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Read

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little scanner!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here - awesome little scanner - light, good battery life, great for scanning my travel receipts when I’m out on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Ian K Craft

customer_reviews.title: Great for its intended use.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is very handy for the home and on the road. It moves around when in use because it is so light and has no weight to hold it in place. The software is good and suits my purpose. The images are clean. This is probably not the scanner to use in a busy office but for occasional use, this is a great device.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it make the upside-down scans into right-side-up ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it make the upside-down scans into right-side-up automatically. So if someone scan in the wrong direction, I don’t end up with extra work, trying to uptight the page after the scam.
customer_reviews.author: Tumbleweed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome punch in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Awesome punch in a small package! I hooked mine up to my Android phone to send documents to vendors for my feed store. Don't know how I lived this long without this device.
customer_reviews.author: Rach'sRamblings

customer_reviews.title: The best company and the best product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and the company that backs it up is even more important. For any problem you you can come across Fujitsu will help. If they cant solve the issue they will get somebody that will. They have earned a loyal. Customer
customer_reviews.author: Mrlova

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with my organization 6 months ago. It has far surpassed my expectations but effortlessly printing from both my iPhone 6 and my laptop. I would highly recommend this for the professional on the go but requires uploading information in a snap .
customer_reviews.author: John Emery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Scans VERY fast. Bought a hard case off Amazon to keep it in while traveling. It is the perfect travel scanner!
customer_reviews.author: ps

customer_reviews.title: ScanSnap is a snap to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was referred to me by a colleague who saw me go to the copier to scan articles and other items. She recommended the ScanSnap. It is indeed a snap to use. I only had to have the network engineer approved the download of the software because it is an office computer, but once that was done, it was easy to use. It worked right way. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this scanner. It's very fast and has high resolution.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Going paperless is made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with it's own software for simple filing or to easily redirect documents to an established filing system on your computer. Images are clear, with accurate color reproduction and document feed is easy. The scanner itself is small, easy to transport and most important, it is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Does very good but the battery doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Does very good but the battery doesn't last long. I get about 20 minutes of use before it dies on me. Cable was also on the short side but I was able to scan docs with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased scansnap for one thing, to scan my receipts and it is small enough to tuck away when not being used. The receipt scanning program (you have to do that from fujitsu’s website) works very well. It does have some room for improvement but I still give this 5 stars. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: I SENT IT BACK AND PURCHASED BROTHER DS-720 AND I AND GLAD, IT WAS 1/3 OF PRICE AND WORKS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT WORK WHEN RECEIVED AND TECH SUPPORT WAS OF NO HELP. I SENT IT BACK AND PURCHASED BROTHER DS-720 AND I AND GLAD, IT WAS 1/3 OF PRICE AND WORKS GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Comparoto Cpa

customer_reviews.title: Loving It
customer_reviews.text: I got this quickly and well packaged. It's working great and I'm very happy with it. It does a fast job on scanning.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.H. Nosenbook

customer_reviews.title: Very good scanner for mobile business, short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: If you using the wireless connection, the battery life is short, maybe 50 pages with one charge, not like 260 as the manufacturer states. This is not a negative for me because I never scan more than 15-20 pages at the time. Scan quality is good, software is good too.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Scans like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Easily connected to my Mac with Catalina OS installed. Scans my reciepts quickly and with high quality. Overall, happy and satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Jelinek

customer_reviews.title: Scasnap
customer_reviews.text: Love it and so easy to use. The only down side is the feed is so strong sometimes crumples the paper
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: The performance once installed is great, it makes sending an original document so easy
customer_reviews.text: Convience has never been so simple. I have an older model for work, but wanted one for my personal use. The updated wi-fi on this unit was why I purchased this one. It was somewhat challenging for me to install, my son assisted and then it was smooth sailing. The performance once installed is great, it makes sending an original document so easy, everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Long

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My wife is using it to digitize several hundred photographs. She loves it. Puts the photos in one after the other and they scan in no time. The quality is excellent. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This made my expense submissions so much faster instead of scanning/emailing every receipt via phone! I'm a consultant so I'm always on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Trang Tran

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for my travel needs - small and cordless so ...
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for my travel needs - small and cordless so I have no excuse in keeping up with my receipt and document logs into my reports. Needed help in configuring the wireless for my laptop and the support was just outstanding. Proud supporter of the ScanSnap full product line. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Griff450

customer_reviews.title: The speed is very good as well
customer_reviews.text: I have a full size version of this at home and swear by it if you have lots of scanning to do. I do a lot of consulting and will regularly capture lots of information, manuals, notes, etc. This works phenomenally for being able to do so quickly, without a lot of fuss or cables. The speed is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Geek917

customer_reviews.title: Great little scanner
customer_reviews.text: It’s small and it it is incredibly easy to use. Even though it doesn’t do two sided automatically, it can still be done manually without much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: "sierramary"

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchasing if you don't like continually fiddling around with your computer
customer_reviews.text: Using the iX100 with a Dell XPS 15-9550 and Windows 10. I have continuous problems trying to get the device to connect to the computer using the USB interface. I have run through their troubleshooting for connecting several times as well as uninstalling the ScanSnap software and reinstalling it to no avail. I just don't have the time to have something this undependable while traveling on the road not to mention the tons of time it takes to trouble shooting the problem. My time is too valuable to spend so long and so often to get something to connect. Not worth the purchasing if you don't like continually fiddling around with your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Scottsdale Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it personally but was informed by my finance office they love how easy it works and how easy it was to setup.
customer_reviews.author: David Barnes

customer_reviews.title: It worked beautifully when it worked
customer_reviews.text: I have used this scanner a total of 2 times and now it will not recharge either through computer or electrical outlet. It worked beautifully when it worked. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Yount

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I scan receipts and photos. It is nice to scan old photos for my family tree. It is fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: efficient and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Small, efficient and very easy to use. Not sure the extra money for wireless was worth it, since I basically use it next to my computer all the time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Junker

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Great Software
customer_reviews.text: This little scanner is fast! My old Doxie broke and thought I'd try this. Set-up was a breeze! The software is excellent (I'm mainly using this to organize receipts. Wish I had tried it before.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fujistus is the best scanners by far
customer_reviews.text: this is a must for any professional on the go. i am just betiding to use it, i can hardly wait to get to the wireless part where i can just pull it out and scan to my phone!
customer_reviews.author: robert rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle. Keeps going off the WiFi. No problem when connected. Contact with the manufacturer is difficult - one might as well attempt to reach extraterrestrials.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Scanner
customer_reviews.text: We have had other portable scanners made by other companies, including the ones on display at Staples, but this by far the best scanner we have used. It is much faster than the others, more convenient to use, and the software makes it more functional.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about a month then stopped . Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Duperre

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: This worked PERFECTLY to scan page after page after page and save it all as one PDF.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyMoose

customer_reviews.title: Great portable performance
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Fujitsu scanners and I am very happy with this one as well. Portability is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool for my job!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable scanner. It scans with a perfect resolution, fast and even organize business cards in my contacts! Saves me time and helps me to do businesses while saving paper since gives the options to send it to my phone, mail, archives, etc. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana L. Contreras-Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, well constructed and durable but I do suggest buying the hard case that goes with this unit. I liked it so much that I bought scanners for the rest of my office employees for business.
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner. I've been using it for probably almost a year now at least and I've had no problems. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. So easy to set up and scan
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So easy to set up and scan. Software is great too. Portable and easy to stow away; this is great as the whole purpose is to save space by getting rid of all your papers!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Very fast scanner. I bought the older version a few years ago but this new one really works well. It's faster. It takes to scanning like a champ. Really great scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Mainecoon Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I have another Fujitsu at home, this one is wireless and works perfect! flawless to my computer or my smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: JAKE COHEN

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scanner. I've had a Fujitsu before that just quit working after several years. I replaced it with a Brother - boy was that a mistake. Sent it back right away and picked this one up. This is just like the old one, that scans quickly, easily, and produces very high quality. No doubt in my mind that Fujitsu makes the best scanners out there.
customer_reviews.author: swierczma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a mobile scanner, there is just no other scanner as good as the Fujitsu. This scanner works flawlessly and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott_H

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is used daily and the software is very user friendly. Only had for a couple of months but really enjoy it even though I have a all in one printer scanner copier fax at my desk!!
customer_reviews.author: MITCH HEBERT

product_meta.title: Fujitsu PA03688-B005 ScanSnap iX100 Wireless Mobile Scanner for Mac and PC,Black
product_meta.description: Style:iX100 ScanSnapManufacturer: Fujitsu Part: PA03688-B005 UPC: 097564308444 Category: Peripherals - Scanners - Sheet feed Scanners Description: Fujitsu Scan Snap iX100 Fujitsu Scan Snap iX100 - Sheeted scanner - 8. 5 in x 34. 0 in - 600 dpi x 600 dpi - USB 2. 0, Wi-Fakery Selling Points * Light compact body * The fastest mobile scanner in its class * No need to switch the Wi-Fi mode manually * Battery operated without the necessity of cable connection * Dual Scan - scanning 2 small sized documents at the same time * Automatically stitch a two-page spread * Scan Snap Receipt * Scan Snap Sync Description Description: SCANSNAP IX100 WLS MOBILE SCANNER Fujitsu Scan Snap iX100 - Sheeted scanner - 8. 5 in x 34. 0 in - 600 dpi x 600 dpi - USB 2. 0, Wi-Fi The cross platform compatible Scan Snap iX100 brings the power and intuitiveness of the Scan Snap range of models to a compact and totally wireless format. Light-weighing Scan Snap iX100 comes with a USB rechargeable Lithium-ion battery that is capable of up to 260 A4 scans on a full charge. Combined with an ability to scan either via a wireless network to PC workstations or mobile devices, this Scan Snap delivers a true "scan anytime scan anywhere potential". The Scan Snap Receipt software allows you to easily scan and extract information from your receipts, and even export the data for tax filing. With Scan Snap Sync built into Scan Snap Organizer software and the Scan Snap Connect app, captured documents are automatically synchronized with all your devices through Dropbox, Google Drive or Microsoft OneDrive. What's In The Box * Fujitsu Scan Snap iX100 * Scan Snap Manager, Card Minder, Scan to Microsoft SharePoint, ABBYY Fine Reader for Scan Snap, Scan Snap Organizer Produce. Operating Temperature: 5°C to 35°C (41°F to 95°F).
feature_bullets: Portable scanning you can take with you anywhere. Wirelessly scan your documents to your laptop, smartphone, or tablet devices
Able to scan a full colored page in just 5.2 seconds
Rechargeable battery allows you to scan up to 260 documents on a full charge
Optical resolution of up to 600 dpi. Dual scan.Power requirement:5 V/0.5 A
One button simplicity with easy to use software. Scan directly to your desktop or cloud drive (integrated with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, and more) - no driver needed!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars360 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
